message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is in your best interest if we want to avoid inflation eating away at our potential gains.
Let's split things a bit more fairly this time, Alice.  We both lose out if this drags on.
This is my final offer, Bob.  The inflation is eating away at your potential gains faster than mine. Take it or leave it.
Okay, Alice, I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle.  This is a fair deal considering the inflation working against me.
